biotools.summary:
A Fast and Accurate Exhaustive Higher-Order Epistasis Search.

BitEpi: An exhaustive search of higher-order epistatic interactions.

BitEpi is software for an exhaustive search of higher-order epistatic interactions between genomic variants (SNPs) given a binary phenotype (Case/Control).

BitEpi performs an exhaustive search that means it tests all possible combinations of SNPs. For example, the 4-SNP search of 50 SNPs (data.csv) requires to test all "4 out of 50" 4-SNP combinations (230300 4-SNP combinations)
